title: GPT-5.2

title: Meta shuts down global accounts linked to abortion advice and queer content
author: ta988
aiHeadline: Meta continues its quest to be the internet's biggest busybody by shutting down accounts that dare to discuss abortion and queer content, because nothing says 'free speech' like censorship.

title: Disney making $1B investment in OpenAI, will allow characters on Sora AI
author: tiahura
aiHeadline: Disney invests $1B in OpenAI, because what better way to control your thoughts than by having Mickey Mouse and Minnie in your AI assistant? Now, Sora AI will be your new best friend... or your new overlord.

title: UK House of Lords attempting to ban use of VPNs by anyone under 16
author: nvarsj
aiHeadline: UK House of Lords wants to ban VPNs for under-16s, proving once again that lawmakers have no idea how the internet works, but hey, at least they're trying to keep kids safe from... whatever they're trying to protect them from.
